name: Scavengers (June 2018)
description:
SCAVENGERS

I made this game in mid-2018, after having produced my first ever game "Galaxy Shooter". To create this, I followed an online tutorial on 2D survival games. I learnt how to randomise enemy/item spawn locations, implement a grid based movement system, a turn-based gameplay system, and became familiar with sprite animations. After completing this prototype, I successfully created an Android port for it.
